sen.j: 金ヶ岬（かながみさき）は、京都府舞鶴市に属し、日本海（若狭湾西部）に面する岬。
sen.e: kanagamisaki Cape belongs to Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture, and fronts on the Japan Sea (western part of Wakasa Bay).
Kanagamisaki Cape belongs to Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture, and faces the Japan Sea (western part of Wakasa Bay).
Kanagamisaki Cape belongs to Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture, and faces the Japan Sea (western part of Wakasa Bay).

sen.j: 舞鶴湾の湾口の西側、栗田湾の東に位置する。
sen.e: It is located in the east of Kunda Bay on the west of mouth of Maizuru Bay.
It is located in the east of Kunda Bay on the western side of Maizuru Bay's mouth.
It is located in the east of Kunda Bay on the western side of Maizuru Bay's mouth.

sen.j: 若狭湾国定公園に含まれる。
sen.e: It is part of the Wakasa Bay Quasi-National Park.
It is part of the Wakasa Bay Quasi-National Park.
It is part of the Wakasa Bay Quasi-National Park.

sen.j: 若狭湾に突出している形になっている。
sen.e: Kanagamisaki Cape juts into the Wakasa Bay.
Kanagamisaki Cape juts into Wakasa Bay.
Kanagamisaki Cape juts into Wakasa Bay.

sen.j: 地形は海に面して断崖絶壁であり、険しく聳え立つ。
sen.e: Its topography facing the sea is a precipitous cliff rising up sheer from the sea.
Its topography consists of a sheer cliff which rises up and faces the sea.
Its topography consists of a sheer cliff which rises up and faces the sea.
